mapper.select: SELECT PK_APPROVAL_ID,APPROVAL_TYPE,NEXT_APPROVAL,DATA_TYPE,APV_STATION,IS_ENDING,IS_START,APPROVAL_PEOPLE, T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME AS approvalPeopleName, T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.POSITION_NAME AS stationName FROM T_APV_APPROVAL LEFT JOIN T_STAFF_INFO ON T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID = T_APV_APPROVAL.APPROVAL_PEOPLE LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_POSITION ON T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.PK_POSITION_ID = T_APV_APPROVAL.APV_STATION where APPROVAL_TYPE = #{apvType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATA_TYPE = 1 and APV_STATION != 'csr'

SELECT PK_RECORD_ID, APPROVAL_TYPE, SPONSOR, START_TIME, APV_APPROVAL, APV_DATE, APV_RESULT, APV_REASON, NEXT_APPROVAL, SOURCE_ID, IS_START, T_APV_APVTYPE.APVTYPE_NAME AS apvtypeName FROM D_APV_RECORD LEFT JOIN T_APV_APVTYPE ON D_APV_RECORD.APPROVAL_TYPE = T_APV_APVTYPE.PK_APVTYPE_ID WHERE D_APV_RECORD.IS_ING = 1 and SOURCE_ID in (SELECT SOURCE_ID from D_APV_RECORD where IS_ING = 1 and APV_APPROVAL = #{apvApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from D_APV_RECORD where SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId} and APV_APPROVAL = #{userId} AND APPROVAL_TYPE = #{approvalType} AND IS_ING = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into T_APV_APPROVAL (PK_APPROVAL_ID,APPROVAL_TYPE,APPROVAL_PEOPLE,NEXT_APPROVAL,DATA_TYPE,APV_STATION,IS_ENDING,IS_START) values
( #{item.pkApprovalId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.approvalType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.approvalPeople, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nextApproval, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.apvStation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isEnding, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isStart, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update T_APV_APPROVAL
APPROVAL_TYPE = #{approvalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_PEOPLE = #{approvalPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_APPROVAL = #{nextApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APV_STATION = #{apvStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ENDING = #{isEnding,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_START = #{isStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PK_APPROVAL_ID = #{pkApprovalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_APV_RECORD
APV_DATE = #{apvDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APV_RESULT = #{apvResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APV_REASON = #{apvReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PK_RECORD_ID= #{pkRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
